name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D】みんなとの絆をチェックして、歌って重大告知を目指す！【#トワ様重大発表】 [t2j89jXBhO8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: The members discuss the result of the previous prompt, 'Idol Pose'.
A new prompt from Nekomata Okayu is presented: 'The pose when Nekomata Okayu is injecting "Mesu"'. The members struggle to interpret and match it.
The next prompt from Okayu is 'Tokoyami Towa's pose when surprised in a haunted house'. The members fail to match their poses again.
The final prompt of the section is presented: 'What comes to mind when you hear "Summer"?'.

subtitles.original: え、これ？
subtitles.english: Wait, this?

subtitles.original: あ、そうだったっけ？
subtitles.english: Ah, was that it?

subtitles.original: でも、トワ様これハート作ってないけどね、いつも。
subtitles.english: But Towa-sama doesn't usually make a heart like this.

subtitles.original: サマーじゃん！サマー！サマーじゃん！お題サマーじゃん！
subtitles.english: It's 'Summer'! Summer! It's 'Summer'! The prompt was 'Summer'!

subtitles.original: ああ、サマーか。なるほどね。
subtitles.english: Ah, 'Summer'. I see.

subtitles.original: はい。ということで、え、じゃあ次どうぞ。ポン！
subtitles.english: Okay. So, then, next one please. Bam!

subtitles.original: 何だ何だ？
subtitles.english: What is it, what is it?

subtitles.original: 猫又おかゆからのお題。
subtitles.english: A prompt from Nekomata Okayu.

subtitles.original: 「猫又おかゆがメスを注入してる時のポーズを全員一致」
subtitles.english: “All match the pose when Nekomata Okayu is injecting 'Mesu'”

subtitles.original: 「猫又おかゆがメスを注入してる時のポーズを全員一致」...えぐいことなん？
subtitles.english: “All match the pose when Nekomata Okayu is injecting 'Mesu'”... Is that something nasty?

subtitles.original: え、これおかゆさんのお題なんですけど。
subtitles.english: Wait, this is Okayu-san's prompt.

subtitles.original: 他人にメスを注入してる時ってこと？
subtitles.english: You mean when she's injecting 'Mesu' into someone else?

subtitles.original: それとも自分に？自分に？！自分に？！
subtitles.english: Or into herself? Herself?! Herself?!

subtitles.original: マジで？！くさっ！え、どういうこと、どういうこと？
subtitles.english: Seriously?! That's gross! Wait, what do you mean, what do you mean?

subtitles.original: 自分にどう注入するの？
subtitles.english: How would she inject it into herself?

subtitles.original: メスを注入...そのポーズってこと？
subtitles.english: Injecting 'Mesu'... that pose?

subtitles.original: 分かんない、こうやってる時じゃない？え？！
subtitles.english: I don't know, maybe like this? What?!

subtitles.original: ケツに？！
subtitles.english: In the butt?!

subtitles.original: どういう解釈をすればいいんだよ、これは！
subtitles.english: How am I supposed to interpret this?!

subtitles.original: でも今のは、自分、スバルちゃんのみんな見ちゃったから。
subtitles.english: But since I just saw everyone's, including Subaru-chan's...

subtitles.original: 見ちゃった。両手でこう、こう...。
subtitles.english: I saw it. Like this with both hands...

subtitles.original: 他人のじゃん、他人の。
subtitles.english: That's for someone else, someone else.

subtitles.original: こうやって、頭に。
subtitles.english: Like this, in the head.

subtitles.original: 頭に...やばいだろ！
subtitles.english: In the head... that's crazy!

subtitles.original: 他人じゃん、他人。人にか！
subtitles.english: It's someone else, someone else. Into a person?!

subtitles.original: え、なんか襲いかかってるみたいにならない？
subtitles.english: Wait, doesn't it look like she's attacking someone?

subtitles.original: え、他人、他人に...。
subtitles.english: Wait, someone else, someone else...

subtitles.original: え、じゃあ他人にメスを入れてるってどうしよう。
subtitles.english: Wait, then what should we do for 'injecting Mesu into someone else'?

subtitles.original: 自分にじゃないの？これ。
subtitles.english: Isn't it into herself? This.

subtitles.original: え、自分になの？
subtitles.english: Wait, into herself?

subtitles.original: 自分になの？やっぱりね、メス、自分にメスを入れるんだ。
subtitles.english: Into herself? As I thought, she injects 'Mesu' into herself.

subtitles.original: メスになりたいからさ。
subtitles.english: Because she wants to be 'Mesu' (feminine).

subtitles.original: え、なんかやばいポーズ取れそうで怖いんだけど。
subtitles.english: Wait, I'm scared we might strike a really bad pose.

subtitles.original: 正解わかんねえ！
subtitles.english: I don't know the right answer!

subtitles.original: じゃあもうとりあえず、そこはもう甘えてやるか。
subtitles.english: Well, for now, let's just go with our own interpretations.

subtitles.original: え、でもさ、直接的にこれ...
subtitles.english: Wait, but if we do this directly...

subtitles.original: やばいよね、やばいよね。
subtitles.english: It's bad, right? It's bad.

subtitles.original: やばいよ、やばい。やばい、モザイクかけてくれ。
subtitles.english: It's bad, bad. Bad, someone put a mosaic over this.

subtitles.original: やばい、やばい、襲いかかってこないで！モザイクかけてくれ、もう。
subtitles.english: Bad, bad, don't attack me! Put a mosaic over it already!

subtitles.original: どうすればいいの？！難しすぎるよ、これ。
subtitles.english: What should I do?! This is way too hard.

subtitles.original: え、もういい、もういい。もういいかなって思ってる。
subtitles.english: Wait, I've had enough. I think I'm done.

subtitles.original: もういっか、もういいよね。
subtitles.english: Whatever, it's fine now, right?

subtitles.original: え、じゃあ、もう行くよこれ。なんかこれね、深掘りするととんでもないことになるから。
subtitles.english: Okay, let's just go with this. If we dig into it, things will get crazy.

subtitles.original: もう早くやろ。確かに。
subtitles.english: Let's just do it quickly. True.

subtitles.original: え、ということで。猫又おかゆがメスを注入してる時のポーズを全員一致！せーの！
subtitles.english: So, here we go. Everyone match Okayu's 'Mesu injection' pose! Ready, set...

subtitles.original: もう、こう、こうしかない！
subtitles.english: This, this is all I've got!

subtitles.original: こういう感じじゃない、もう。え、どう？
subtitles.english: Isn't it like this? Well, how's it?

subtitles.original: お！え、ぺこらちゃんは中腰でしょ？
subtitles.english: Oh! Wait, Pekora-chan is in a half-crouch?

subtitles.original: うん。
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: ミオちゃんは、え、それ注入されてるポーズじゃなくて？
subtitles.english: Mio-chan, wait, isn't that a 'being injected' pose?

subtitles.original: されてる側、にゃお〜。ああ、なるほどね。
subtitles.english: The one being injected, nyao~. Ah, I see.

subtitles.original: え、でもスバルちゃんは？ちょっとケツ、ケツ出しな感じか。
subtitles.english: Wait, what about Subaru-chan? Kinda sticking your butt out.

subtitles.original: あ、そう。や、でもおかゆ先輩ちょっと座ってるのが、あるかなみたいなイメージ。
subtitles.english: Ah, right. No, but I have this image of Okayu-senpai sitting down.

subtitles.original: あ、今、確かに。や、座りだね。感じながらよ。注射のポーズはしたけど。
subtitles.english: Ah, now that you mention it. Yeah, it's a sitting pose. While feeling it. I did an injection pose though.

subtitles.original: じゃあ私もさ、さっきこれだったからやばいなと思って。
subtitles.english: Me too, I was doing this earlier and thought it was too much.

subtitles.original: やばいやばいやばいって。ということで、おかゆからのお題は、失敗！
subtitles.english: Bad, bad, bad! So, Okayu's prompt is... Failure!

subtitles.original: ということで全然合わないじゃん。
subtitles.english: See, we didn't match at all.

subtitles.original: これ合わないとさ、ダメなのよ。わかる？
subtitles.english: If we don't match, it's no good. You get it?

subtitles.original: そんなこと言われてもお題難しいよ！
subtitles.english: Don't say that, the prompt was too hard!

subtitles.original: すぎるよ！ギリギリに立ってるよ、俺ら。
subtitles.english: Way too hard! We're standing right on the edge!

subtitles.original: いろんな意味で危ないよね。危ない、危ないからこうやって。
subtitles.english: It's dangerous in many ways. It's dangerous, so we're doing this.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫、ライン踏んでも超えなきゃ大丈夫だから。
subtitles.english: It's okay, as long as we step on the line but don't cross it, we're fine.

subtitles.original: 踏むなよ。人によってはアウトになるぞ。
subtitles.english: Don't step on it. Depending on the person, it'll be 'Out'!

subtitles.original: そうだぞ！はい、ということで仕切り直しましょう。カンニングはしちゃダメだからね。
subtitles.english: That's right! Okay, so let's reset. No peeking allowed.

subtitles.original: はい！はい！え、じゃあ次のお題どうぞ。ポン！
subtitles.english: Yes! Yes! Okay, next prompt please. Bam!

subtitles.original: え、「お化け屋敷でびっくりした常闇トワのポーズを全員一致」...おかゆから！
subtitles.english: “All match Tokoyami Towa's pose when surprised in a haunted house”... From Okayu!

subtitles.original: 「お化け屋敷でびっくりした常闇トワのポーズを全員一致」
subtitles.english: “All match Tokoyami Towa's pose when surprised in a haunted house”

subtitles.original: え、じゃあトワが正解ってことぺこね。そうだね、トワが正解。
subtitles.english: Wait, so Towa is the 'correct answer', peko. That's right, Towa is the answer.

subtitles.original: そうだね。え、びっくりした時のポーズでしょ？もう決まりでしょ、こんなん。
subtitles.english: Yeah. A surprised pose, right? It's already decided, obviously.

subtitles.original: え、ぺこら、トワ様のこれかなっていうのがあるけどな。
subtitles.english: Wait, I have an idea of what Towa-sama's pose might be.

subtitles.original: パ、パ、パ、パ。私も、あるわ。
subtitles.english: Pa-pa-pa-pa. I have one too.

subtitles.original: え、ないな。まあ出たとこ勝負でやるか。じゃあ出たとこ勝負。オッケー。
subtitles.english: I don't. Well, let's just go for it and see. Okay, let's wing it.

subtitles.original: はい。じゃあ行きますよ。お化け屋敷でびっくりしたトワのポーズを全員一致で！せーの！
subtitles.english: Okay. Here we go. Everyone match Towa's haunted house surprise pose! Ready, set...

subtitles.original: あ！
subtitles.english: Ah!

subtitles.original: あれ？
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: え、どう？ん？待って待って。え、ぺこちゃん可愛い。
subtitles.english: Well, how is it? Huh? Wait, wait. Pekora-chan is cute.

subtitles.original: え、なんかびっくりしてる...まあ、びっくりしたら見ないから。
subtitles.english: Wait, like being surprised... well, if you're surprised, you don't look.

subtitles.original: 見ないの？なるほどな。え、トワはもうこれ、ほら、これ正解だからこれ。
subtitles.english: You don't? I see. Look, Towa's is this! This is the correct one!

subtitles.original: あ、可愛すぎないか？
subtitles.english: Ah, isn't that too cute?

subtitles.original: スバルちゃんのそれさ、狙ってるだろ、ウケを！
subtitles.english: Subaru-chan, you're aiming for a laugh with that, aren't you?!

subtitles.original: 違うよ！これは、とんでもないことが起こった時に...
subtitles.english: No! This is for when something absolutely crazy happens...

subtitles.original: テンパりすぎて、一周回ってたか、よくわからない、よくわからない。
subtitles.english: And you panic so much that you spin around or something, I don't even know.

subtitles.original: それはイカれたタカのポーズだろ！
subtitles.english: That's a 'crazy hawk' pose!

subtitles.original: いや違う、こうなってないだろ！
subtitles.english: No, it's not like that!

subtitles.original: でもさ、待って、ミオちゃんも相当やばかったよ。
subtitles.english: But wait, Mio-chan's was also pretty bad.

subtitles.original: え、似たような...一緒だよね？
subtitles.english: Wait, similar... they're the same, right?

subtitles.original: いやいやいや、もうなんかそれはさ、違う。もっと可愛い感じだよ、トワは。
subtitles.english: No, no, no, that's wrong. Towa is supposed to be more cute.

subtitles.original: はぁ？！こっちだろ！こっちだよ、ミオの方が可愛い！
subtitles.english: Hah?! It's this one! It's this one, Mio's is cuter!

subtitles.original: 何で正解がさ、怒られなきゃいけないんだよ！
subtitles.english: Why do I, the one with the correct answer, have to be yelled at?!

subtitles.original: おかゆ、トワには厳しいな。
subtitles.english: Okayu is strict with Towa.

subtitles.original: みんな全然わかってないよ。またまた失敗！
subtitles.english: Everyone has no idea. Another failure!

subtitles.original: ダメか。ダメだ。頼むわ、マジで。
subtitles.english: No good, huh. It's no good. Come on, seriously.

subtitles.original: はい。頼むわ、マジで。告知したいわ。
subtitles.english: Okay. Seriously, please. I want to make the announcement.

subtitles.original: 告知したい。はい、では次ポン！
subtitles.english: I want to announce it. Okay, next one! Bam!

subtitles.original: お！「夏と聞いて思い浮かぶものを全員一致」
subtitles.english: Oh! “All match what comes to mind when you hear 'Summer'”

subtitles.original: 「夏と聞いて思い浮かぶものを全員一致」
subtitles.english: “All match what comes to mind when you hear 'Summer'”

subtitles.original: 上にお、何何？
subtitles.english: What, what?
